title: Pre-Work Study Guide

title: Refractor Project
description: This project showcase an optimized webpage version of Horiseon- a marketing agency. The codes were refactored so as to meet accessibility standards.

title: Bootstrap Portfolio
description: This is a webpage showcasing my works, skills and contact details built with Bootstrap.

description: This is a simple random password generating webpage.

description: This is a simple quiz webpage. It's just a fun quiz games consisting of 5 questions in based javascript.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: This is a webpage for users to search and get basic current and 5-day weather information (including temperature, windspeed and humidity) in any city of their choice.

title: Country Guide and Flavour
description: This is a collaborative project. Country Guide and Flavour is a brand dedicated to providing customers with an experience to explore different countries to get general information including authentic taste of these countries.

description: This is a command line application to generate professional readme files for new projects.

title: Team Profile Generator
description: This is a Node.js command-line based application for generating basic team profile for software engineer team.
